meanings.sent1: Scientists study antimatter to understand its unique properties.
meanings.sent2: The concept of antimatter is fascinating to physicists around the world.
meanings.sent3: At the science fair, Tim created a model of antimatter that won first place.
meanings.sent4: In the world of physics, antimatter is like the mirror image of regular matter.
meanings.sent5: The collision of matter and antimatter can result in a powerful release of energy.

meanings.definition: A hypothetical form of matter in which particles have the opposite charge of normal matter particles.
meanings.sent1: The existence of antimatter in the universe is still a subject of research.
meanings.sent2: Some scientists believe that antimatter could be used as a future energy source.
meanings.sent3: During the science experiment, the students jokingly referred to the missing ingredient as antimatter.
meanings.sent4: Imagining a world made of antimatter sparks the imagination of science fiction writers.
meanings.sent5: The concept of antimatter challenges our understanding of the fundamental building blocks of the universe.
